text: Peter Ian Philpott (21 November 1934 â€“ 31 October 2021) was an Australian cricketer. He was a leg-spin bowler and middle order batsman. He played for New South Wales and the national team in the 1960s. He was born in Manly, New South Wales. Philpott died on 31 October 2021 at the age of 86 from problems caused by a fall in New South Wales. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Australian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
title: Peter Philpott
